Text:
It was under the ‘sampige’ - 
 The fragrant champa tree
 That I waited for Ajji 
 To walk me home. 
 All along I’d ask her - 
 Neer dosa? Allugeda? Bhaath? 
 She’d simply shrug 
 Smiling indulgently

All along I’d ask her - 
 Neer dosa? Allugeda? Bhaath? 
 She’d simply shrug 
 Smiling indulgently. 
 Lunch was a glorious affair

My joyous feet dangling. 
 Eyes hungry, mouth watering. 
 Awaiting Ajji’s spread 
 The whole recipe

Next steps, videos. 
 Even Ajji’s jokes. 
 Are now online to see

The day before her birthday. 
 Ajji’, he said, You'll be happy . 
 I had no reason to doubt his words

And there he was, waiting in line. 
  As the hours ticked by 
 I began to laugh 
 With my whole body

I knew I could never change 
 The person I was born to be 
 But I had to change

I knew I could never change 
 The person I was born to be 
 But I had to change
DO: Calorie basics 101: Add a 0 to your weight and donate.
